title: 1.12.1版本纯净版崩溃
author: skyz319
txt_content:
1.12以前的版本均可运行,唯独1.12及1.12.1无法运行,使用HMCL启动后就崩溃,未安装Mod,完全纯净版...
启动器报错exit code 255,游戏文件夹内容也清理过并重新下载游戏,均无法正常运行..

crash-reports内容:

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 8/26/17 12:57 PM
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ca/weblite/objc/NSObject

replies.author: skyz319
replies.txt_content: 已解决... 更换了启动器版本就正常了...
